alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 5:39PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Eyewall of Hurricane Ian Approaching Western Sections of Glades and Hendry counties... Hurricane Ian continues to move north northeast around 8 mph. With this movement, radar trends indicate the eyewall of the hurricane will move over portions of western sections of Hendry and Glades counties through early evening. Wind gusts in excess of 100 mph have been observed in the Fort Myers area within the eyewall, and damaging hurricane force winds are expected to move across western sections of Hendry and Glades counties over the next few hours. HAZARD...Hurricane force winds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Widespread damage is expected. Locations impacted include... Labelle, Palmdale, Port La Belle, Ortona and Muse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...>100 MPH
info.instruction: Persons in this area should seek shelter immediately! This is a very dangerous situation.
